email.title: Pintos Glasses Collection
email.text:
Hi all,
We are thrilled to announce that after 2 years of plain Pintos pain, we can once again distribute our **Pintos Survivor glasses** - and they might come along with a small surprise!
Pop by rooms **217/218** in Huxley on **Tuesday** the 15th between **1 pm and 3 pm** to grab yours!
